name: Money or Death (7 Deadly Sins Series)
name_original: Money or Death (7 Deadly Sins Series)
description:
This is the fourth game in a series of 7 games each based on one of the 7 deadly sins, this is the game based on the sin of Greed.

Mr. Greedy, a 35 years old man, receives a mysterious letter where he is invited to participate in a game where he can win a ton of money if he wins, so he accepts the invitation with no hesitation.

The game takes place in an old building in the mountains.

When he arrives at the location, he is greeted by the organizers of the game, Solar and Lunar, they will then take Mr. Greedy to the room where the game takes place.

When they enter the room, they find a mysterious woman who seems to be missing her body called Ghair.

Ghair explains to Mr. Greedy how the game works :

The player has to jump on platforms to reach the end of the room, below the platforms are spikes, so the player must not fall or else they'll be severely injured or even die.

Will Mr. Greedy win or lose the game ? What’s really going on inside this mysterious building ?

Made with Godot 3.4

CONTROLS :

-Directional arrows and WASD keys to move around.

-Mouse to look around.

-SPACE or ENTER to enteract with objects.

-SPACE, ENTER or left mouse to skip dialogue.
